page.title: 18Rail & Bus Travel Hollington
page.content: The main railway line from{Hastings to {Charing X}passes through our area. The journey altogether takes about 1hr.45min. There are about 22 trains a day each way; leaving every hour and more often at rush hour times for London workers. They all stop at {Crowhurst}station. Last year the big Victorian station buildings here were pulled down, and a small ticket office put up. They are working on replacing the old diesel trains with an{electric system, and hope to be finished in 1986. The journey will then be quicker and more comfortable. A disused track (once going to Bexhill) can be clearly seen at Crowhurst. A good{bus service}runs to Hollington along Battle Road (at least 7 an hour) It costs 45p from Hastings centre. 4 services (5 buses an hour) go to Tesco There are no buses to Crowhurst.
